title: The examinacion of Master William Thorpe preste accused of heresye before Thomas Arundell, Archebishop of Ca[n]terbury, the yere of ower Lord .MCCCC. and seuen. The examinacion of the honorable knight syr Jhon Oldcastell Lorde Cobham, burnt bi the said Archebisshop, in the fyrste yere of Kynge Henry the Fyfth.
author: Thorpe, William, d. 1407?
notes: Edited by William Tyndale? or George Constantine?--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
